format: C# source code for an ASP.NET Core Web API controller
description: This file defines the NotesController class, which handles HTTP requests for managing notes. It provides endpoints to get all notes, get a note by ID, create, update, and delete notes, using dependency-injected services and logging.

classes.name: NotesController
classes.description: API controller for managing notes, exposing CRUD endpoints.

methods.name: GetAll
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all notes, ordered by last updated date descending.

methods.name: GetById
methods.description: Retrieves a single note by its GUID ID.

methods.name: Create
methods.description: Creates a new note from client payload, enforcing title requirement.

methods.name: Update
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by GUID ID with new data.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Deletes a note by its GUID ID.
